fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You are role-blockable.
- You are controllable.
- You are unique.
- You cannot be hanged during the day.
- Conversion immune.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
You may order a player's death during the day, killing them instantly. If they do not die, it is revealed that the target survived. (1 use)
You may have your guards block all visits to you during the night, excluding Astral visitors, this stops all attacks (besides Astral attackers). (3 use)
